rukus.text: Say: travel throughout the earth and see what the end of the deniers was

Say: to whom belongs whatever is in the skies and on the earth? Say: to God. He prescribed the mercy upon Himself. He shall gather you on the resurrection day, that there is no doubt about it. Those who lost their souls do not believe
And whatever inhabits in the night and in the day belongs to Him, and He hears all and knows all

Say: should I take a protector other than God, creator of the skies and the earth, and He feeds and He is not fed? Say: indeed I am ordered to be the first of (or the best of) the ones who submitted and not to be of the polytheist
Say: indeed I am afraid of the punishment of a great day if I disobey my Master
Anyone whom (punishment) is kept away from him on that day, indeed He had mercy on him, and that is the clear victory
And if God touches you with a harm then no one can eliminate it except Him, and if He touches you with good (no one can hold it back), He is capable of everything
He is the dominant over His servants, and He is the wise and the well aware

Say: what thing is greatest testimony? Say: God, a witness between me and you, and this Quran was revealed to me in order that I warn you and whoever it reaches with it. Do you testify that there are other gods with God? Say: I do not testify. Say: He is the only one god, and I am free of what you associate (with Him)
Those whom We gave them the book, know him (Muhammad) as they know their children. Those who lost their souls do not believe
